argument.description: An expression that returns a value of any built-in numeric data type.
An expression that returns a value that is a character-string or Unicode graphic-string representation of a number with a length not greater than the maximum length of a character constant.
An expression that returns a value that is a character-string or Unicode graphic-string representation of a number with a length not greater than the maximum length of a character constant.
An expression that is of one of the following data types: DATE.
An expression that is of one of the following data types: DATE.
An expression that is of one of the following data types: DATE.
An expression that is of one of the following data types: DATE.
An expression that returns a Boolean value (TRUE or FALSE).

description: The BIGINT function returns a big integer (a binary integer with a precision of 63 bits) representation of a value of a different data type.
